text: Edwin Ronald Barnes (6 February 1935 â€“ 6 February 2019) was an English Roman Catholic priest and a former Church of England bishop. He was born in Oxford and the Anglican Bishop of Richborough from 1995 to 2002. He was the president of the Church Union.Crockfords(London, Church House 1995) ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Church of England bishops Category:People from Oxford Category:English Roman Catholic priests
